metodoX.heroDesc: A revolutionary scientific approach based on neuroplasticity and gamma waves to optimize brain performance at every stage of life.
metodoX.sectionDesc: Our method is based on 4 fundamental pillars that work together to enhance your cognitive capacity.
metodoX.step1Hook: From Scattered Mind to Laser Focus
metodoX.step1Desc: Before learning, we need to "turn on" the hardware. We use a hybrid approach: Brain Gymnastics (physical movements and educational games) to activate coordination, simultaneously powered by a Gamma Audio-frequency environment that puts the brain in a state of relaxed alertness.
metodoX.step1Detail: We combine sensory-motor stimulation with brain waves to train Sustained Attention and Processing Speed, creating the ideal brain chemistry for learning.
metodoX.step2Hook: From Phonetic Code to Visual Speed
metodoX.step2Desc: We adapt the technique to your brain's exact stage: Initial Stage (6-8 years) we work with the Phonetic Method. Fluency Stage (8-10 years) we eliminate syllabic reading, teaching intonation and rhythm. Advanced Stage (11+ and Adults) we activate speed, training the eye to capture entire phrases visually.
metodoX.step2Detail: We evolve from Phonological Awareness (decoding), through Prosody and Inferential Comprehension (fluency), to the optimization of Saccadic Movements (visual speed).
metodoX.step3Hook: From Messy Storage to Smart Library
metodoX.step3Desc: The brain doesn't store lists, it stores connections. For children: we teach organizing ideas through visual associations, colors, and sequences. For adults: we use structured Mind Maps to hierarchize complex information.
metodoX.step3Detail: We develop Radiant Thinking and Logical Association. We strengthen Working Memory and long-term memory through memorization techniques adapted to the student's cognitive stage.
metodoX.step4Hook: From Storing Information to Communicating Ideas
metodoX.step4Desc: The cycle doesn't end until you express it. We help the student bring knowledge "outward". We train the ability to overcome shyness, mentally organize ideas, and speak them with confidence, going from passive student to confident communicator.
metodoX.step4Detail: We strengthen Executive Functions (planning and decision-making), Language Comprehension, and Public Speaking for the construction of knowledge out loud.
metodoX.prog1Desc: This program focuses on the transition from oral to written language naturally and without academic stress.
metodoX.prog2Desc: We consolidate fluent reading and work on literal comprehension so the child understands what they read.
metodoX.prog3Desc: We eliminate syllabic reading and train intonation, rhythm, and the connection between words and ideas.
metodoX.prog4Desc: We activate visual speed, training the eye to capture entire phrases and eliminate the internal voice.
metodoX.prog1Obj: Develop phonological awareness and grapheme-phoneme connection as the foundation of reading code.
metodoX.prog1Bases: Stimulation of the phonological route, sequential auditory memory, and visual grapheme discrimination.
metodoX.prog2Obj: Consolidate reading processes and achieve mechanical fluency to overcome academic delays.
metodoX.prog2Bases: Strengthening of the lexical route, automation of decoding, and improvement of processing speed.
metodoX.prog3Obj: Eliminate syllabic reading and develop inferential comprehension with intonation and rhythm.
metodoX.prog3Bases: Activation of reading prosody, development of global comprehension, and mental schema integration.
metodoX.prog4Obj: Activate rapid visual reading by eliminating subvocalization and optimizing saccadic movements.
metodoX.prog4Bases: Peripheral visual field training, reduction of eye fixations, and expansion of reading span.

aleer.subtitle1: At the Dawn of a New Educational Era
aleer.description: Join our revolutionary initiative that seeks to ignite the passion for reading in the hearts of Bolivia's students. Through an inter-school contest, we inspire students to explore worlds of knowledge and creativity. This is your moment to contribute to a significant educational change. Discover how!
aleer.objectivesDesc: We drive Bolivia's educational future with a reading contest that not only cultivates the love of books among primary school students, but also sharpens their analytical and comprehension skills.
aleer.obj1Desc: We drive the passion for reading and reading comprehension among primary and secondary students, opening doors to worlds of knowledge and adventure.
aleer.obj2Desc: Our initiative focuses on enriching interpretation and textual analysis skills, preparing students to explore and understand the depths of literature and beyond.
aleer.obj3Desc: We promote an environment where sharing and trusting become the foundation for a rich learning experience, enriching the educational journey of each student.
aleer.obj4Desc: Through our contest, we identify strengths and areas for improvement in each student, guiding them toward their maximum academic potential.
aleer.obj5Desc: We recognize and reward excellence in reading, highlighting student achievements in a special event that inspires the entire educational community.

velocidad_lectura.prepInstructions: Read the text as fast as you can while maintaining comprehension. Your speed is measured in words per minute.

lectura_test.prepInstructions: Read the text carefully and answer the comprehension questions. Your speed and understanding will be evaluated.

neurosync.title: Neuro-Sync
neurosync.prepSubtitle: Sync cognitive impulses by moving the receptor
neurosync.prepInstructions: Move the circular receptor with your finger to intercept falling impulses. The more you sync, the faster the game becomes.
neurosync.exitTitle: Are you sure you want to exit?
neurosync.exitMessage: Your current progress will be saved automatically.

neurolink.title: Neuro-Link Pro
neurolink.prepSubtitle: Connect neurons to strengthen your cognitive network
neurolink.prepInstructions: Connect the nodes in numerical order before time runs out. Each level increases the number of nodes and reduces time.
neurolink.prepDesc: Connect the nodes in numerical order before time runs out
neurolink.exitTitle: Are you sure you want to exit?
neurolink.exitMessage: Your current progress will be saved automatically.

memoryflash.title: Memory Flash
memoryflash.prepSubtitle: Train your visual memory with light sequences
memoryflash.prepInstructions: Memorize the sequence of illuminated cells and reproduce them in the same order. Difficulty increases with more cells and longer sequences.
memoryflash.prepDesc: Memorize the sequence of illuminated cells and reproduce it in order
memoryflash.exitTitle: Are you sure you want to exit?
memoryflash.exitMessage: Your current progress will be saved automatically.
memoryflash.footer: MEMORY FLASH SYSTEM v1.0 | IQ EXPONENTIAL

neurolector.prepInstructions: A category will be shown (e.g. FINANCE). Words will appear one by one. Tap the screen ONLY when the word belongs to the indicated category. If you tap an incorrect word, you lose points. If you miss a correct word, you also lose points. Every 5 consecutive hits, the category changes!

neurolector.exitMessage: Your current progress will be saved automatically.
